data.speaker: Player
data.content: The voice in my head comes to a crescendo, a great booming laugh. I can hear it echo inside my skull...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: 'OH MAN!! YOU REALLY ARE A GULLIBLE MORON!!!' I can't believe you let me live'

data.speaker: Player
data.content: 'You really seemed to enjoy destroying the other paintings didn't you??'
You didn't what? Are you okay?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: 'That last painting you destroyed? He was actually the nicest guy I ever met. Oh well. No sweat of my canvas.'

data.speaker: Player
data.content: 'Alright, get out of here, morons. I have people waiting for me in my basement.'

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I... I just did... I wanted... to get out...
I don't know why you're mumbling to yourself, but whatever you did to those paintings seems to have opened a door...
